mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user(t_user_id, t_user_name, t_user_pwd, t_user_role) VALUE (#{id}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{role});
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(t_user_id, 14, 3) as last_id, SUBSTRING(t_user_id, 1, 13) as t_id FROM t_user WHERE SUBSTRING(t_user_id, 1, 10) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(SYSDATE() AS DATE)) ORDER BY t_id DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_student(t_stu_id, t_stu_name, t_stu_tel, t_stu_address, t_stu_email) VALUE (#{id}, #{stu_name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{email});
INSERT INTO t_nsuser(t_ns_id, t_ns_name, t_ns_privilege, t_ns_tel, t_ns_email) VALUE (#{id}, #{ns_name}, #{privilege}, #{tel}, #{email});
mapper.select: select t_nsuser.t_ns_id, t_nsuser.t_ns_name, t_nsuser.t_ns_privilege, t_nsuser.t_ns_tel, t_nsuser.t_ns_email, t_user.t_user_name from t_nsuser inner join t_user on t_nsuser.t_ns_id = t_user.t_user_id where t_ns_id = #{id};

choose.when: SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 1, 2) as lastNum FROM r_dmsch_name ORDER BY lastNum DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 3, 2) as lastNum FROM r_dmsch_name ORDER BY lastNum DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 5, 3) as lastNum FROM r_dmsch_name ORDER BY lastNum DESC LIMIT 1;
choose.otherwise: SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 8, 3) as lastNum FROM r_dmsch_name ORDER BY lastNum DESC LIMIT 1;
